titleStmt.title: A discourse of that which is past since the kings departure from Gouy, to pursue the prince of Parma: euen til the first of May. 1592. The last letters thereof came on the fourth of the same month according to the English computation. with new additions by later letters.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Wolfe, and are to be sold at his shop, ouer against the South-dore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Variant: does not have "with new additions by later letters." in title.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
